website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight tackle bag that slings comfortably over your shoulder and keeps your essential gear organized.
pros: Multiple compartments for organizing your gear
cons: Some find the bag too small and the shoulder strap  too long

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great for trout fishing and creek fishing! Very comfortable! Great product very roomy fits all my fly boxes and trout bead boxes! pliers flashlight drinks! But this is very comfortable around the back and front i really Would buy another one no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: small, comfy but holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, i was using sling bags for a while but every time I got down it would swing right down and hated that. With this one having the waist strap I don't worry about that problem and it actually holds plenty of tackle too.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas and packed it why fishing stuff and now I want one! Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dolish

customer_reviews.title: PLENTY OF ROOM AND POCKETS !!.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, If you're going to buy this pack, you will be happy with it. BUT, BEWARE , The color in the picture is a little misleading. It looks like a tan color but it is green. Khaki is what they call it but its green. No matter, its still a great pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just a really nice creel...like the amount of pockets, pouches straps for hauling as much as you need. Ability to hold rod for walking just cool (though watch overhead branches ). Side pockets really convenient for grabbing stuff. Water bottle holder- etc. Overall 5 stars, though this is intended to replace a simple canvas creel, no literature included outlining features. Giving another as gift, recipient may not appreciate some of the features, suppose its self explanatory but unless web site seen might escape end user what they received. So I copied info/pics and printed out to included with creel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit and NOT made for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the look and features when I took it out of the box. However, when I tried it on, it had a very weird fit and I discovered that it is NOT made for big guys. I'm not huge or really fat, but the waist strap was intended to be used by smaller guys. When you put the shoulder strap on along with the waist strap, it did not line up correctly on my body. It was not designed very well. With some correct fitment and sewing, this could be a nice pack.
customer_reviews.author: BLinKY

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use bag. 5☆, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband to bank fish on the river we live on. The colors was spot on. It has so many pockets. He really enjoyed trying to find more thing to fit in all the pockets. It's very comfortable to carry and user friendly. Thing is this is not only a fishing bag. It works great as a hunting bag. I'm ordering a 2nd one now for him to carry items to hunt with. For the quality & the cost. It's a win win. You can call this a multi use bag. You need to get you 1.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Melton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: This sling is perfect for working up and down the beach surf fishing. There is an additional waist strap that keeps it nice and secure as I walk and cast. It has a place for my bait net. There is a lot of storage, I'm able to put two small tackle boxes in if needed (not included) or a bunch of different bags of soft baits. There are straps and pockets everywhere. It seems to be really well made, the zippers are robust and should last me for a while. Even when loaded down it is fairly light. And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it works great I pack what I need in it and go. Was a little bigger than I expected but hey I'm ok with it. I'm going to be getting another one for my bow hunting stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bag, I carry this bag with me all the time with some of my main tackle. Or if I am going to fish I only put what i need this way i dont have to be carrying all my gear. I wish it was a bit more space in main compartment, two tackle trays fit but snug. I recommend this bag to everyone. I normally have two rods so the one I am not using on its attached to bag, this way I dont have to put rod down on grass or mud and get it dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit, no shifting while fishing, and easy access to the compartments. Great design!
customer_reviews.text: You get more than you pay for with this bag. Great ease of access to the compartments, secure rod holder, and the fit is awesome. No sliding/shifting while casting (with 2 rods strapped in) and a bag you don’t have to set down to change lures.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rad

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I recently got back into fishing as an adult; haven’t done this since I was young. Soo I’ve been carrying around a tackle box and a backpack along with other gear. One fishing trip two guys were going to try and rob myself and my friend (who was in the water fishing); I was fishing off of the embankment in view of our things. Thank goodness things turned out good for us! But this bag will DEFINITELY ensure you have everything you need right on you! It’s lightweight, comfortable, organized, spacious, just everything you want in a fishing tackle bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Over engineered
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just me but I can't figure out how to wear it. Swung over my left shoulder is comfortable, but you can not access anything without taking if off. Swung over my right should give me full access, but it is very uncomfortable. And the pole holder pocket they show in the add is as useless as I expected. I put a 7 foot pole with no rigging and it flops over as gravity demands.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my fiancé. Perfect size for a small fishing trip to our local lake
customer_reviews.author: Anna Monhollen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with tackle boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Wish it came with Plano boxes included.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stirk

customer_reviews.title: so far its great
customer_reviews.text: after years with my "man bag" it was looking a bit thread worn and stinky. i bought this as a replacement. so far I love it. all my gear from the old bag fit and left me with plenty of room for more! this has held up well so far, and doesn't stink after being dunked in the river while wading.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I like this compact, well designed shoulder strap gear bag. it is a perfect size to carry essential gear for steelhead and trout fishing trips.
customer_reviews.author: rsg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fishing gear
customer_reviews.text: Like that holds alot of fishing gear and it’s comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: cori lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great budget wading pack
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a great purchase. Plenty of pockets and attachment points for clips etc. Have no issues getting all of my gear out on the water with me. I can easily fit 3-4 60-fly waterproof fly boxes in the small pouch, and the large pouch can easily fit a medium sized tackle box or a very large fly box. Straps adjust easily and accommodate pretty much any [reasonable] body size. I haven't used this for an extended period of time but the quality seems more than acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: I really overall like this bag. The only thing I have a problem with are the rather oddly placed carrying straps. But its very roomy for a smaller bag, and has many compartments. Its also very thick and seems like it will have years of use; very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandar

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tackle Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice strap and good pocket storage. The built-in rod holder was perfect for the telescoping fishing rod we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: We are getting older and the heavy tackle box we've drug around for years has been making fishing less fun. This backpack is the answer. Tons of pockets and easy to carry more than we need!
customer_reviews.author: Jim W Lifto

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for fishing and/or scouting for spots
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. Comfortable, light weight, lots of room for fishing stuff and special waterproof pouch for keys or phone. Wish it had some protection on the bottom, like little rubber feet or a protective layer for the bottom for when you have to sit it down on the ground but overall fantastic item. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jared R Carini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Product fits great and works as advertised. I fish on a daily basis from the bank. This works perfect. It saves my back with the fanny strab
customer_reviews.author: Austin Ellegard

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Well made and seems very durable. Comfortable to wear . I use it for creek fishing and it holds everything I need. Has a place for water bottle and fishing pole holder. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: charles mccrady

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Lots of storage, and very durable material! Cant wait to get out on the ice with it this year!
customer_reviews.author: ALEX Lovas

customer_reviews.title: Multiple use bag.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Able to put all my tackle boxes that I need, and also all my fishing tools. I use one of the pockets to conceal my pistol which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Kersting

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend to a fishing buddy
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a light weight, tactical, compact fishing bag this one is gonna be the one to get. Theres plenty of space in each pocket. Perfect for keeping in the car when you just want to go fishing anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Eylias Romero

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best I’ve owned! Fits everything I need and more! I struggle to get the belly strap hooked, but I am 38”, so that’s my fault for being a little round.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then what I thought it was going to be especially to fit around a grown man. More for a skinny teenager or smaller person in general
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Crumb

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for me, its light weight enough that it didn't get in the way while fishing. I have a back pack but due to shoulder issues had to look for something that would work better and keep the weight off my shoulders. This was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fishing tackle bag. I kayak fish and this bag gets all of the tackle out from inbetween my feet. I was surprised how cool the bag was. Fushed on a 90 degree day and bag was not hot. In the kayak I do not use the shoulder strap just the waist strap. Bag sits perfect. Easy to access everything and the top of the bag makes a work bench.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I find that by unclipping the waist strap you can swing the whole bag around to get access. Easily fits two tackles boxes as described. The pliers holder is a little bit out of reach and I kind of doubt the zippers will last more than a couple years. But, after some extremely heavy use this bag as held its own and I haven't had a single issue. One of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.author: mike powell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was as portrayed. Very well constructed. Enough pockets and bag space for what I wanted to use it for. The one shoulder carry is nice. The waist belt can be used or adjusted out of the way. Excellent for the price.Nice Bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to where. Strong material. So far no problem with zippers and fasteners. Bag is a little small. Main pouch can only handle 2 Smaller Plano organizers. I wish it could carry 3 for my preference. No the less I enjoy using this to pack my fishing gear to go surf fishing.
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Bag was of good quality and we were happy with our t.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and the recipient was very happy with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Pittman Churak

customer_reviews.title: pockets and zipper lengths
customer_reviews.text: water bottle pocket is too narrow. zippers should go further as they do not allow easy access into large and small pockets. In general good but probably would not purchase again due to these items. The straps and fit are good.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really good product for the price. Will buy this brand again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SLS00555

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag for day trips! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times now. Bag woks great for wade fishing! Not sure about zipper durability is why I only gave it 4stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great,awesome what a great value compared to other more exspensive  slings
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing sling.Awesomefor what I need. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag quality material and super impressed with how well it fits. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Long shoulder srap
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely love this except the shoulder strap is too long. I am 5’4”. But I still really like it!
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: Best tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag for fishing, super light and secure. A lot of compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: A very well thought item A lot more features than stated Well recomended
customer_reviews.author: William brown

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband when he fishes on our river in his small fishing boat.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of it i can fit 4 small lure lock cases in it or 2 medium size with plenty of room plastics in the front, i will definitely be done with the normal tackle boxes lure lock and this are a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Kullhem

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems like it’s made well but I think there’s better options as far as having easy access to your tackle. It’s bulky and the compartments aren’t easy to work with. I bought it because it seemed like it would be super convenient but I kind of regret the order after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as decribed
customer_reviews.text: So far it it a perfect option for taking along for fishing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed by the quality for the price! And the design is great. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Works good and is comfy to wear
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this bag. Works really good for when u have to hike around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made bag, haven't used it yet. Very comfortable, and lots of places for tackle. Belt is adjustable. Overall, great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Dyann Aspiazu

customer_reviews.title: Súper confortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: It has many pockets and a lot of space. Really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect for walk fishing. Plenty of room to pack food for day with tackle.
customer_reviews.author: neal hipp

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had a vest and got tired of all the bulk. Got this bag and has more than enough room for all my gear and then some.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

product_meta.title: Piscifun Sling Fishing Tackle Bag, Outdoor Fishing Storage Pack, Water-Resistant Fishing Bag Cross Body Sling Bag(Black, Khaki, Camouflage)
feature_bullets: DURABLE & WATER-RESISTANT: Piscifun Slider Sling Fishing bag is made of high density water-resistant 1000D nylon fabric. The abrasion resistant and indestructible KAM buckle and SBS zippers are a lot more durable than others on the market.

PLENTY OF STORAGE POCKETS: 4 zippered Pockets, 2 hook & loop fastener pockets and 1 mesh bottle pocket offer a lot of organized space. The dimension of the main compartment is 10.62*9.06*3.94inch(L*H*W). It is big enough for carrying two 3600 tackle boxes. Other small pockets are easy to store fishing lures, pliers, lines the accessories you need in your life such as wallet, phone, keys etc.

COMFORTABLE AND ERGONOMIC: The breathable and ergonomic padded back paired with adjustable main strap and waist strap provide super comfortable feeling. The main strap with detachable shoulder pads provides incredible protection for your shoulder. You can secure the bag very well with the ergonomic waist strap.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL BAG: With the ability to extend the main strap length to 36.2”, you can use the Piscifun Slider tackle bag in many ways, such as sling shoulder bag, fishing tackle box bag, camping bag, hunting bag, hiking bag, travelling bag etc. A great bonus feature for this bag is that you can also carry your rod with the rod holder design.

EXQUISITE WORKMANSHIP: Best choice for outdoor life enthusiasts.You are owning a super durable tackle bag with the double sewing feature. The easy to reach waits pocket offers spare room for small accessories, like phone, keys, pliers , fishing lures, fishing hooks.
